values: A dilemma is a difficult situation in which a choice has to be made.
Choosing either the tastier or healthier drink proved to be quite a dilemma.
n. a situation in which you have to make a difficult choice 困境
n. 困境；进退两难；两刀论法
n. 左右为难形容词:dilemmatic
